title: 怎么删除权限?
txt_content: 输入/mangdelp builder essentials.back后会出现是怎么回事？

replies.txt_content:
xujh 发表于 2014-4-23 19:59
mangaddp builder essentials.back
然后呢？

xujh 发表于 2014-4-23 19:59
mangaddp builder essentials.back
喂，说话,你说的这样没用

replies.author: 一见客
replies.txt_content: 试试这个 /manuaddp 玩家名字 essentials.gamemode

replies.author: a799760183
replies.txt_content: 如果你要禁止一个组的back权限 那你就输入/mangaddp builder -essentials.back 就行了
